nodes.bodyText: This probably shouldn't be being set to a dev version and checked in. Maybe updating the dependencies to the latest GA version would be better?
Definitely shouldn't have dev versions in there. I'll revert that.

I would prefer that we keep the test with DAC and then use reflection to set the authority host until this is fixed:  #8626
That way the test is consistent across languages: Test DAC and we can remove the reflection once that issue is resolved.  @g2vinay

It was implemented in the beta here: 
  
    
      azure-sdk-for-java/sdk/identity/azure-identity/src/main/java/com/azure/identity/DefaultAzureCredentialBuilder.java
    
    
         Line 21
      in
      5dd0c40
    
    
    
    

        
          
           public DefaultAzureCredentialBuilder authorityHost(String authorityHost) { 
        
    
  


So, ideally this test runs against beta and we use that.
Smoke tests run from the latest nightly packages available. Here it is succeeding with the new syntax: https://dev.azure.com/azure-sdk/internal/_build/results?buildId=296102&view=results
